abstract: The contents of the file wrapper as an opaque data object.
overview:
## Discussion

This property contains a data object in the format used by the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSPasteboard/PasteboardType/fileContents] pasteboard type. This data object is also suitable for passing to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/init(serializedRepresentation:)].

This property may be `nil` if the user modifies the contents of the file system node after you call [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/read(from:options:)] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/init(url:options:)], but before [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper] has read the contents of the file.  You can use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/ReadingOptions/immediate] reading option to reduce the likelihood of this problem.

# serializedRepresentation

**Instance Property**

The contents of the file wrapper as an opaque data object.

## Declaration

```swift
var serializedRepresentation: Data? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains a data object in the format used by the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSPasteboard/PasteboardType/fileContents] pasteboard type. This data object is also suitable for passing to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/init(serializedRepresentation:)].

This property may be `nil` if the user modifies the contents of the file system node after you call [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/read(from:options:)] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/init(url:options:)], but before [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper] has read the contents of the file.  You can use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/ReadingOptions/immediate] reading option to reduce the likelihood of this problem.

## Related Documentation

- **init(serializedRepresentation:)**: Initializes the receiver as a regular-file file wrapper from given serialized data.
